breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment as follows:
history.text:
Equipment designed for deposition of a film, containing silicon and carbon, and having a dielectric constant (k) of less than 5.3, into lateral openings having widths of less than 70 nm and aspect ratios greater than 5:1 (depth: width) and a feature-to-feature pitch of less than 100 nm, while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 400 °C and less than 650 °C, and having all of the following:
Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;
d.2.a. Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;
Two or more vertical injectors; and
d.2.b. Two or more vertical injectors; and
A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source.
d.2.c. A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source.
